meanings.definition: A device used for making mathematical calculations.
meanings.sent1: I used calculators to add up all the numbers quickly.
meanings.sent2: My friend always carries a calculator in his backpack for math class.
meanings.sent3: The calculators at the store were having a competition to see who could multiply the fastest.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a calculator, always processing numbers and equations effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The bright red calculator on the desk caught my eye, reminding me of the importance of accuracy in math.

meanings.definition: A person who calculates or computes.
meanings.sent1: The calculators in the office were busy all day, working on budget projections.
meanings.sent2: She is a skilled calculator, able to estimate expenses with great accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The calculators in the accounting department were known for their quick mental math skills.
meanings.sent4: He was a human calculator, always able to figure out percentages in his head.
meanings.sent5: The young calculator impressed everyone with his ability to solve complex equations without any help.
